html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11952017-09-22,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications Commission ** Programmation **
PrecisOrder requesting that the CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION make a report as soon as feasible, but no later than June 1, 2018, on the distribution model or models of programming that are likely to exist in the future; how and through whom Canadians will access that programming; the extent to which these models will ensure a vibrant domestic market that is capable of supporting the continued creation, production and distribution of Canadian programming, in both official languages, including original entertainment and information programming.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications Commission ** Programmation **
precis: Order requesting that the CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION make a report as soon as feasible, but no later than June 1, 2018, on the distribution model or models of programming that are likely to exist in the future; how and through whom Canadians will access that programming; the extent to which these models will ensure a vibrant domestic market that is capable of supporting the continued creation, production and distribution of Canadian programming, in both official languages, including original entertainment and information programming.
